titleStmt.title: His Majesty taking into his princely consideration the present condition of divers of his good subjects now in, and about the city of Oxford, who have faithfully served him in his warre, against those who are in rebellion against him
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
